# Nowica, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Nowica  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Wilczęta, within Braniewo County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north-west of Wilczęta,  south of Braniewo, and  north-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
